name: one-page-restaurant-html-css-template
description: Relax, sit back and fine dine with this delicious one page restaurant template that showcases the restaurants finest foods.
author: Matthew Hartman <matthewhartmanau@gmail.com>

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production rm -rf dist && parcel build --no-content-hash src/index.html --public-url ./ --out-dir ./dist
